DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to assess the effectiveness of Menopur to achieve clinical pregnancy in females undergoing intrauterine insemination in clinical practice.
DOC.brief_title: Assessment of the Effectiveness of Menopur in Intrauterine Insemination
DOC.criteria: Infertile couples for over one year (primary or secondary) or infertile women (or not) with indication of PAI or DAI Seminal sample suitable for artificial insemination treatment according to the criterion of each centre Patient prescribed therapy with Menopur in artificial insemination Contraindications to intrauterine insemination Contraindications to Menopur
